article_title: Radu Teodorescu: Mental health system, underfunded and overcrowded, fails
article_text:
A hospital psychiatrist describes a mental health system beset by problems, exacerbated during the holidays

He asks Gov. Sam Brownback, “When did intolerance and indifference become the embodiment of our politics?”

article_metadata.news-keywords: kansas, brownback, mental health, topeka, funding, medicaid, mentally ill, dementia
article_metadata.description: In an open letter to Kansas Gov. Sam Brownback, a Topeka psychiatrist describes a mental health system beset by funding and resource problems.
